results.title: [An animal model for testing hypoglycemic and hypolipidemic drugs].
results.text_hl: Two of them were antihyperglycemic drugs, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and a Recipe of Chinese Herbs (RCH).
